sections.body: Orphaned in a giant attack, Rindol dedicated his life to learning about giantkind so he can aid the dwarven people in destroying them. He specializes in magic that can confound giants' unsophisticated minds, and has memorized grand tales and songs of dwarven glory.

name: Rindol Runehand
